entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near midnight then to rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 this evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
